comment: * Model for spot shadow rendering. Assumes single light, single object.

variables.name: mLightRadius
variables.comment: No need to be final but making it immutable for now.

variables.name: mPoly
variables.comment: No need to be final but making it immutable for now.

methods.name: public int getLightRadius()
methods.comment: * @return size of the light source radius (light source is always generated as a circular shape)

methods.name: public float[] getPoly()
methods.comment: * @return object that casts shadow. xyz coordinates.

methods.name: public int getPolyLength()
methods.comment: * @return # of vertices in the object {@link #getPoly()} that casts shadow.

methods.name: public void setLightCoord(float x, float y)
methods.comment:
* Update the light source coord.
     * @param x - horizontal coordinate
     * @param y - vertical coordinate

methodNames: public void setLightCoord(float x, float y)
